description: To provide a scholarship to a UCO Student who meets the following criteria: Eligibility Requirements Complete the qualifying application and submit a transcript Must be a declared history major or minor Minimum 3.0 GPA Provide a one-page essay on your thoughts regarding patriotism and preserving American history. Letter of recommendation Open to all residents of Oklahoma, preference given to a current Edmond resident Preference will be given to applicants who have an affiliation with the National Society Daughters of the American Revolution. Award Requirements Recipient of the scholarship is required to attend a meeting of the Cordelia Steen Chapter Must write a thank you letter to the Steen family donors.

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
